ch0217_00_handsome/0101_0701_01_10:
You made it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I need
your help to protect the peace here on Pasio!
ch0217_00_handsome/0101_0701_02_10:
If you spot anyone acting suspicious, just
let me know!
ch0217_00_handsome/7101_0701_01_10: As you may know, I go by my code name: Looker.
ch0217_00_handsome/7101_0701_02_10:
There was a time when I was
called 100kr.
ch0217_00_handsome/7101_0701_03_10:
I like my current code name better, though. It’s
much more personable.
ch0217_00_handsome/7102_0701_01_10:
I am a master of disguise! I’ve done stakeouts
disguised as other people—and even a boulder.
ch0217_00_handsome/7102_0701_02_10: Would it be surprising if I told you...
ch0217_00_handsome/7102_0701_03_10:
that I actually spoke to you the other day
in disguise?
ch0217_00_handsome/7103_0701_01_10: Sync pair dynamics on Pasio sure are fascinating!
ch0217_00_handsome/7103_0701_02_10:
As a sync pair, you eat together, spend time
together, sleep together...
ch0217_00_handsome/7103_0701_03_10:
It allows you to really bond with your Pokémon!
I hope we can stay this way forever!
ch0217_00_handsome/7104_0701_01_10:
To be honest with ya, I’m actually not the best
at Pokémon battles.
ch0217_00_handsome/7104_0701_02_10:
But my partner Croagunk helps me out a lot
with that.
ch0217_00_handsome/7104_0701_03_10:
It’s fascinating to watch how Croagunk fights
based on its survival instincts.
ch0217_00_handsome/7105_0701_01_10:
I once went under cover in Kalos for
an investigation.
ch0217_00_handsome/7105_0701_02_10:
Lumiose City was even more beautiful than
what I’d heard!
ch0217_00_handsome/7105_0701_03_10:
The hearts of the people who live there were also
just as pure and beautiful!
ch0217_00_handsome/7105_0701_04_10:
You should visit there sometime. You never
know—it could turn out to be a life-changing
experience!
ch0217_00_handsome/1701_0701_01_10: Hello there! I’ve got something for you!
ch0217_00_handsome/1701_0702_01_10:
It might not be a special tool from the International
Police, but it’s still pretty useful!
ch0217_00_handsome/2501_0701_01_10:
I’ve been to a lot of different regions because of
my work.
ch0217_00_handsome/2501_0701_02_10:
Each time, I’ve met excellent Trainers like you who
were willing to help me out!
ch0217_00_handsome/2501_0702_01_10:
Just so you know, there’s one thing I always look
forward to whenever I visit a new region.
ch0217_00_handsome/2501_0702_02_10:
I’m talking about the food, of course! Whenever
I’m on break from investigating, I make a point of
tasting the most popular local dishes!
ch0217_00_handsome/2511_0701_01_10:
“The more wonderful the meeting, the
sadder the parting.”
ch0217_00_handsome/2511_0701_02_10:
The day you and I part ways may
eventually come...
ch0217_00_handsome/2511_0701_03_10: But I’ve never regretted meeting anyone I know!
ch0217_00_handsome/2511_0701_04_10:
That’s why you shouldn’t think of new encounters
as a sad thing!
ch0217_00_handsome/2511_0702_01_10:
Even the folks I’ve arrested had their reasons for
doing what they did.
ch0217_00_handsome/2511_0702_02_10:
Following the path of justice means I sometimes
have to force others to say their own good-byes.
ch0217_00_handsome/3001_0701_01_10:
When I gaze at the rising sun in the morning, it’s
so beautiful that I forget villains are still
lurking on this island...
ch0217_00_handsome/3003_0701_01_10:
You can get a lot of intel from crowded areas.
Perhaps I should look for an establishment where
people go to enjoy themselves.
ch0217_00_handsome/3005_0701_01_10:
Evil works at night, when it’s dark out. Stay alert
and watch out for suspicious characters!
